name: Tetris!
description:
This is my second reverse-engineered classic game in Unity 2D: Tetris.

To play, use the controls to fit the blocks in the grid. Fill a line to clear it -- your objective is to clear as many lines as possible before the screen fills up.

Source Code (GitHub): https://github.com/cbz0410/TetrisGame

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Controls:

Move Block -- Left Arrow, Right Arrow, A, D

Soft Drop -- Down, S

Hard Drop -- Space

Rotate -- Up Arrow, LShift, Q, E, Z, X

Hold -- C
